reviewtext: I've had only good results with the Stylus. It takes wonderful pics, is very handy to tote around, and takes quite a beating. (My 1st Stylus was a 35mm model and it resided on an open shelf in a boat for 4 years without misfiring once). My only disappointment has been the red-eye reduction, though contact lenses make a real challenge for any direct flash unit I've seen.
summary: Full Function APS in Nice Package.
